description: Vol 1, No 2 (1998) "Rav Hisda said: A man should never terrorize his household. The concubine of Giv'ah [Judges 19-21] was terrorized by her husband, and she was the cause of many thousands being slaughtered in Israel." - BabylonianTalmud, Gittin 6b

is_part_of.title: Women in Judaism: A Multidisciplinary Journal

title: Vol 1, No 2 (1998)
